the-harvester.desc-tool: Description de The Harvester, quand il est apparu, qui l'a créé, à quoi il sert, quel contexte on l'utilise ... =) On peut aussi mettre la description dans l'info-bulle du point d'interrogration près du titre !

aide.domaine: Precise the domain or company name to search in (e.g. www.google.com or Google)
aide.info-source: Define the information source to use among ones available
aide.options: Options associated to The Harvester command (those are not required)
aide.verify: Verify hostname via DNS and search for virtual domains
aide.reverse-dns: Perform a DNS reverse query on all ranges discovered
aide.tld: Perform a DNS TLD expansion discovery
aide.shodan: Use SHODAN database to query discovered hosts
aide.start: Start in result number X (default is 0)
aide.use-dns: Use a specific DNS server (IP or URL)
aide.limit: Limit the number of result to work with
